text: Antonio Pons Campuzano (November 10, 1897 - January 1980) was acting President of Ecuador from August to September 1935. Pons died in January 1980 from pneumonia, aged 82. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1897 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Quito
title: Antonio Pons
